text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
As promised, El Condor Pasa shows<n>up for training the
following day.

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text:
She's fearless, she's bold, she's El<n>Condor Pasa! Having
overcome her<n>injury, she makes her triumphant<n>return to
the ring!

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text: Oh, hello and good morning. You're<n>awfully calm, Trainer.

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text:
So I gotta know! What kind of<n>extremo training are we doin'
today?!

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text:
Is it gonna be thirty laps at top<n>speed?! Or maybe hill sprints
until the<n>sun goes down?!

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text:
Running around town while givin' you<n>a piggyback ride
doesn't sound bad<n>either!
choice_data_list:
How about we do some light jogging on dirt
today?

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text: I see, I see, I see! Some light<n>joggin'—

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text:
Wait, whaaat?! Sorry, did I hear you<n>right just now? Trainer,
could you<n>repeat that?!
choice_data_list:
How about we do some light jogging on dirt
today?

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text:
The exact same<n>sentence—word-for-word! What are<n>you,
stuck on repeat?!

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text: Why?! Why are you doin' this to me,<n>Trainer?!

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text: I am the Umamusume who willone day become the world'sstrongest racer! The condor who willrule over the skies of champions!

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text:
Do you really think I have even a<n>second to waste on
dillydallying on the<n>ground?!
choice_data_list: Fundamentals are important too, you know?

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text: Grr... Urghhh!

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text:
...I understand. I'll run—for now. But if<n>you change your
mind, tell me right<n>away, okay?!

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text: Sigh... How am I supposed tosoar the skies with this kind of normaltraining?

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Despite her complaints, El Condor<n>Pasa makes her way to
the dirt track<n>and begins running.

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text:
Phew... I finished that light jog you<n>wanted me to do,
Trainer.

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text: Qué? Uh, they're fine... No pain at all in<n>either leg.

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text: ...Wait, don't tell me!

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text:
Trainer, you made me do light training<n>because you were
worried about my<n>legs?!

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text:
C'mon, no need to make a fuss! If<n>I'm gonna prove myself
as the<n>world's strongest racer, then we<n>don't have time
to worry about this<n>kinda stuff!
choice_data_list:
You can't become the world's strongest if you're
injured.

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text: Agh. You're right about that, but... But!

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text: I'm sad, shocked, even disappointed.I was really lookin' forward toyour training program, you know.

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text:
Could it... Could it be that you never<n>actually believed in me
from the start?

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text:
Did you think that fundamentals<n>training was just right for a<n>
loudmouth like El Condor Pasa?

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text:
I bet you don't even believe that I<n>could become the
world's strongest<n>racer, do you?!
choice_data_list:
No, I do want to prove that you're the
strongest!

No, I do want to prove that you're the
strongest!

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text: Urk! S-such fiery eyes! That's the<n>passion I know and love!

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text: B-but now I'm even moreconfused! If what you said is true,then what's this training for?!
choice_data_list:
It's to condition your body into becoming the
world's strongest racer!

It's to condition your body into becoming the
world's strongest racer!

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text: Condition my body?!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
El Condor Pasa is still growing. If she<n>pushes herself too
much now, there's<n>a chance she might develop a chronic<n>
injury.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
I explain to her that's why I want her<n>to do training that
suits her current<n>strengths so that one day, when<n>she's
ready, she'll have a body<n>ready to truly become the
world's<n>strongest racer.

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text: ...I see. I see, I see—I totally<n>understand.

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text:
Um, actually, you lost me with all the<n>lingo in the middle. But
at the very<n>least...

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text: I get that you're serious about<n>training me!

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text:
So... there's something I want to ask<n>you. And I want you to
put your all into<n>this answer!

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text:
The world's strongest racer—she flies<n>across the turf at the
speed of light!

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text: And her name is?!

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text: Correct! Bueno!

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text:
You replied with zero hesitation, which<n>means you really do
believe in me!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: El Condor Pasa flashes me a<n>satisfied smile.

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text: Hm... Why don't we do this again<n>from the top?

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text: Just wait riiight there!

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text: ...Here I go!

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text:
Blam! The lightning-quick<n>Umamusume who runs through
storm<n>and squall! Her name—El Condor<n>Pasa!

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text:
Also known as... your new trainee!<n>She's here and reeeady
to ruuumble!

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text:
And on that note... Trainer, I'm looking<n>forward to our new
partnership!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
And so, I took my first step towards<n>soaring the skies with
El Condor<n>Pasa!

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text:
Now, with that over, let's get back to<n>training! Wanna run
with me, Trainer?

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text:
Picture it—beside the world's<n>strongest Umamusume stands
her<n>trainer, the world's strongest muscle<n>behemoth! I
think we could make it<n>work, don't you?!

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text:
Ah! Wait up, Trainer! Don't be like<n>that! Come back! Why
are you<n>running?!
